p: The paired sample t-test was used to compare poultry farmers’ risk perception characteristics regarding human infection with A/H7N9 with those for poultry infection with A/H5N1, and to compare farmers’ PPBs against A/H7N9 (sum all of reported PPB frequencies) with BPBs against A/H5N1 (sum all of reported BPB frequencies). A descriptive statistical method was applied to present the percentage of farmers reporting each coping behavior against human infection with A/H7N9 and poultry infection with A/H5N1.
